name: A Part (Imagine Filmfestival, Joeriri)
description:
A Part is an interactive experience about seperation. You can download it on PC from April 10 to 14 as part of the Imagine Film Festival 2021. The game is being developed by Studio Schubdier, a team of 3rd year students of the HKU.

Live Playtesting

We are offering live playtests of the game! We are curious about your experience of A Part. If you're interested in testing the game live, read more about it and sign up here:

  • Live playtesting signup
Feedback

We are stil working on the game. If you would like to give us feedback about your playing experience, you can do so below here. It helps us a lot!

  • Feedback form EN
  • Feedback form NL
Team

  • Douwe Heijmerink
  • Febe de Vos
